meanings.definition: A type of internet language that replaces letters with numbers or special characters.
meanings.sent1: Many gamers use leetspeak to communicate online.
meanings.sent2: I had trouble understanding the leetspeak in that message.
meanings.sent3: The leetspeak in the chat made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her leetspeak was like a secret code only she could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The leetspeak in the forum was so confusing, I couldn't follow the conversation.

meanings.definition: The practice of altering words to create a unique and often difficult-to-read writing style.
meanings.sent1: Some people find it fun to write in leetspeak.
meanings.sent2: The leetspeak in that post was hard to read.
meanings.sent3: His leetspeak was so jumbled, it looked like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The leetspeak on the website was like a maze of symbols.
meanings.sent5: I tried to decipher the leetspeak, but it was too confusing.
